SDG_GOAL: Goal 1. End poverty in all its forms everywhere
SDG_TARGET: Target 1.b Create sound policy frameworks at the national, regional and international levels, based on pro-poor and gender-sensitive development strategies, to support accelerated investment in poverty eradication actions
